backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a blog backend with CRUD operations for posts (create, read, update, delete), owner-based authorization, image storage via blob-storage mixin, and published/unpublished post filtering.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing a Swedish-language blog application with Internet Identity authentication, post management, image uploads, and editorial design.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining editorial color palette and design tokens for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Swedish language attribute, HKLO title, and root div mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining public login route and protected routes (home, post detail, edit, create) wrapped with ProtectedRoute and Layout components.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: Component that converts Uint8Array images to blob URLs and displays them in a responsive grid with loading states and automatic cleanup.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with HKLO branding header, Swedish navigation (Hem, Skapa inlägg, Logga ut), logout functionality, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Reusable blog post card component displaying title, author, date, content preview, and optional thumbnail image with Swedish "Läs mer" link.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Authentication wrapper that redirects unauthenticated users to login, shows loading spinner during initialization, and renders children only for authenticated users.
frontend/src/data/titleSuggestions.ts: TypeScript data file containing predefined Swedish blog title suggestions organized by five categories (Livsstil, Livsberättelser, Mat, Hobby, Djupa tankar).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Provides image upload functionality with validation (file type, 10MB limit), preview generation, progress tracking, and conversion to Uint8Array blobs for backend submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on posts (get all published, get by ID, create, update, delete) with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm editorial color palette for light and dark modes, including typography enhancements for serif headings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form page for creating new blog posts with title suggestions by category, image upload support, validation, and publish/draft toggle functionality.
frontend/src/pages/EditPostPage.tsx: Form page for editing existing posts with ownership verification, pre-populated fields, existing image management, and new image upload capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a grid of published blog posts sorted by creation date with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component that uses Internet Identity for authentication, displays a welcome card with login button, and redirects authenticated users to home page.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Post detail page component that displays a single blog post with full content, includes edit/delete functionality for post owners, and uses ImageGallery for media display.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormatter.ts: Utility function that converts Time type from backend to formatted Swedish locale date string.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography plugin, container queries, and custom animations for UI components.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features including blog post CRUD operations, Swedish localization, Internet Identity authentication, and editorial design system.
